alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 25 at 3:04AM MDT until October 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches for elevations above 7000 feet and 10 to 20 inches for elevations above 8000 feet. Isolated areas with higher amounts are possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Yellowstone National Park, Absaroka Mountains and Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...From 6 AM today to 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, including over Teton and Togwotee passes. Blowing snow would significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park
